about.description: MMGP is the name of the numerical method proposed at SafranTech, the research center of Safran group, in the paper: Mesh Morphing Gaussian Process-based machine learning method for regression of physical problems under non-parameterized geometrical variability. MMGP also refers to this library, which implements this methods.

MMGP is the name of the numerical method proposed at SafranTech, the research center of Safran group, in the paper: Mesh Morphing Gaussian Process-based machine learning method for regression of physical problems under non-parameterized geometrical variability. MMGP also refers to this library, which implements this methods.

name: mmgp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.0.7" %}

package:
  name: mmgp
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://gitlab.com/drti/mmgp/-/archive/{{ version }}/mmgp-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 63ddeb03d0e5c7a1c6d2a44244f359bed34c512c723cfcb1bbc0ba71f6b4c946

build:
  script_env:
    - SETUPTOOLS_SCM_PRETEND_VERSION={{ version }}
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  noarch: python
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.11
    - setuptools
    - setuptools-scm
    - pip

  run:
    - python >=3.11
    - plaid
    - scikit-learn

test:
  requires:
    - pytest
    - deepdiff
  imports:
    - mmgp
  source_files:
    - tests
    - examples
  commands:
    - cd tests
    - python -m pytest
    - cd ../examples
    - python run_examples.py

about:
  home: https://gitlab.com/drti/mmgp
  summary: 'Mesh Morphing Gaussian Process (MMGP)'
  description: |
    MMGP is the name of the numerical method proposed at SafranTech, the research center of Safran group, in the paper: Mesh Morphing Gaussian Process-based machine learning method for regression of physical problems under non-parameterized geometrical variability. MMGP also refers to this library, which implements this methods.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  doc_url: https://mmgp.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://gitlab.com/drti/mmgp

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bstaber
    - casenave
    - xroynard
